actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to establish a conditional stay of the ban on lead in children's products, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2008 to revise the effective dates relating to the allowable limits on lead in children's products so as to link such dates to the publication of related final regulations and stays of enforcement by the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC).

titles.title: A bill to establish a conditional stay of the ban on lead in children's products, and for other purposes.
